amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: Municipal employees; serving outside corporate limits; regular line of duty.
amendatorysection.para: All municipal employees serving outside the corporate limits of the municipality as authorized in sections 18-1706 to 18-1709 shall be considered and held as serving in their regular line of duties as fully as if they were serving within the corporate limits of their own municipality.
